name: Astral Qube
description:
Protect the Astral Qube!!

Submission for ScoreSpaceGameJam#17

Use WASD to move and mouse to aim

use left mouse button to fire and right mouse button for special attack

Download the game for best Gameplay or play in FullScreen in browser

Contains assets from ambientCG.com, licensed under CC0 1.0 Universal.

Mixamo Y-bot,  X-bot and animations

Music from https://www.zapsplat.com

Particles from unity particle pack
